metadata.synopsis: Unjustly incarcerated for robbery, ex-convict Rocky Mulloy (Dick Powell) returns from a five-year stretch in prison to find the criminal who set him up. Helped by Delong (Richard Erdman), a disabled Marine, and Nancy (Rhonda Fleming), the wife of his best friend, Rocky tracks down racketeer Louie Castro (William Conrad) who engineered the robbery. Complicating Rocky's attempt to nail Castro and find a cache of stolen loot is a police detective (Regis Toomey) who suspects Rocky's motives.

reviews: This efficient revenge yarn was shot in 22 days.
